name: CyBob
description:
CyBob is an adventure story about a determined cyborg on a quest to repair his body and mind. Follow CyBob as he goes from wimpy automaton to powerful terminator.

Submission for Global Game Jam 2020

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement
Ctrl - Crouch
Space - Jump
Left Click - Shoot

Authors:

Art & 3D Models:
Carley Fortier

Programming:
Brad Potzka
Christian Gonzalez

Level Design:
Christian Gonzalez

Lighting & Details:
Brad Potzka
